import{clsx}from"clsx";import{twMerge}from"tailwind-merge";/**
 * Combines multiple class names using clsx and tailwind-merge
 * This utility helps with conditional class names and prevents class conflicts
 */export function cn(){for(var _len=arguments.length,inputs=new Array(_len),_key=0;_key<_len;_key++){inputs[_key]=arguments[_key];}return twMerge(clsx(inputs));}
